column1: rocky lane jenkins| rocky lane jenkins age 63 of pricey creek road
column5: 2015 at his home. rocky was born november 3
column7: kentucky to the late garland jenkins and betty helton jenkins who survives. rocky was a retired coal miner and an employee of the magoffin county funeral home. besides his mother rocky is survived by one son brandon jenkins
column10: two sisters josephine morgan and deloris francis
column11: two grandchildren isaiah stephens and hannah grace jenkins. rocky is preceded in death by one grand child gavin lane music. arrangements are incomplete at this time and will be announced later by the magoffin county funeral home.
